SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a game session of MyShelfie.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int numOfPlayers)
    Creates a new Game object for the specified number of players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numOfPlayers) throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
      Creates a new Game object for the specified number of players.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if the number of players is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • getView

      public GameView getView()
      Returns the ModelView representation of the current game state.
      Returns:
      The GameView object representing the current game state.

    • init

      public void init() throws NullPlayersException
      Initializes the game by setting up private goals, creating the game board, randomly choosing the first player, picking global goals, and marking the game as started.
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if a players is null.
      NullPlayersException

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Checks if the game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username, GameListener listener)
      Adds a player to the game with the specified username, set his listener and notifies all the other listeners.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      listener - The GameListener for the player.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String username, GameListener listener) throws UsernameNotFoundException
      Reconnects the player with the specified username, sets his listener, and notifies all the other listeners of the reconnection.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      listener - The GameListener for the player.
      Throws:
      UsernameNotFoundException - if the specified username is not found in the game.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String username) throws UsernameNotFoundException
      Disconnects the player with the specified username from the game and notifies all the other listeners of the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to disconnect.
      Throws:
      UsernameNotFoundException - if the username is not found in the game.

    • kick

      public GameListener kick(String username) throws UsernameNotFoundException
      Kicks the player the specified username from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to kick.
      Returns:
      the GameListener of the kicked player
      Throws:
      UsernameNotFoundException - if the username is not found in the game.

      Returns the number of players in the game.

      Returns the index of the current player.

      public int getNumOfActivePlayers()
      Returns the number of active players in the game.
      Returns:
      The number of active players in the game.

    • nextPlayer

      public boolean nextPlayer()
      Proceeds to the next player in the game.
      Returns:
      true if the game is not over, false if the game is over.

    • getGoals

      public GlobalGoal[] getGoals() throws CloneNotSupportedException
      Returns a clone of the global goals in the game.
      Returns:
      A clone of the GlobalGoal of the game.
      Throws:
      CloneNotSupportedException - if cloning fails.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(int p) throws InvalidIndexException
      Returns the player at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      p - The index of the player to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Player at the specified index.
      Throws:
      InvalidIndexException - if the index is invalid.

    • getListener

      public GameListener getListener(int p) throws InvalidIndexException
      Returns the listener at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      p - The index of the listener to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The GameListener at the specified index.
      Throws:
      InvalidIndexException - if the index is invalid.

    • getListener

      public GameListener getListener(String username) throws UsernameNotFoundException
      Returns the listener of the player with the specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The GameListener of the player with the specified username.
      Throws:
      UsernameNotFoundException - if the username is not found in the game.

    • checkGlobalGoals

      public void checkGlobalGoals() throws EmptyStackException, InvalidScoreException, InvalidIndexException, MissingShelfException, ColumnOutOfBoundsException
      Checks the global goals for the current player and updates their score accordingly.
      Throws:
      EmptyStackException - if the global goal stack is empty.
      InvalidScoreException - if the score of a global goal is invalid.
      InvalidIndexException - if the index is invalid.
      MissingShelfException - if the player's shelf is missing.
      ColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the column index is out of bounds.

    • getTileSack

      public TileSack getTileSack()
      Returns the tile sack of the game.
      Returns:
      The TileSack of the game.

    • getGameBoard

      public GameBoard getGameBoard()
      Returns the game board of the game.
      Returns:
      The GameBoard of the game.

    • pickTilesFromBoard

      public Tile[] pickTilesFromBoard(Coordinates[] coords) throws InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException
      Picks tiles from the game board at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - The coordinates of the tiles to pick.
      Returns:
      An array of picked Tile.
      Throws:
      InvalidCoordinatesForCurrentGameException - if the coordinates are invalid for the current game.

    • playerInsertion

      public void playerInsertion(Player p, Tile[] t, int column) throws IllegalColumnInsertionException, NoTileException
      Inserts the given tiles into the specified column of the player's shelf.
      Parameters:
      p - The Player to insert the tiles.
      t - The array of Tile to insert.
      column - The column index to insert the tiles.
      Throws:
      IllegalColumnInsertionException - if the column insertion is illegal.
      NoTileException - if no tiles are provided to insert.

    • refillGameBoard

      public boolean refillGameBoard() throws EmptySackException
      Refills the game board with tiles from the tile sack.
      Returns:
      true if tiles were added to the game board, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      EmptySackException - if the tile sack is empty.

    • addCheater

      public void addCheater(String username)
      Adds a cheater to the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the cheater.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner(int p)
      Sets the winner of the game at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      p - The index of the player who won the game.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game and calculates the final scores and the winner.
